benchmark_details.name: BeanCounter
benchmark_details.overview: BeanCounter is a public dataset consisting of more than 159B tokens extracted from businesses' disclosures, designed to provide a low-toxicity, high-quality source of domain-specific content for training large language models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a large-scale, high-quality dataset for training language models that can improve performance in business-oriented NLP tasks while reducing toxicity.

data.source: Extracted from public domain business disclosures via EDGAR.

methodology.calculation: Metrics were calculated based on model performance evaluations on domain-specific tasks and toxicity generation analysis.
methodology.interpretation: Improved model performances indicate the effectiveness of the BeanCounter dataset in training multi-billion parameter models.
methodology.validation: Evaluation procedures involved comparing models pre-trained on BeanCounter against their base models on specific tasks.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The dataset includes personal identifiable information which is publicly available as per SEC regulations.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: The entities have consented to make the information publicly available.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: The dataset is compliant with SEC guidelines on public disclosure.
